description: This file implements an example of a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system using Sentence Transformer reranker with multilingual data, including setup instructions, document processing, knowledge base creation, and agent interaction.

classes.name: Document
classes.description: Represents a document with content used for knowledge base indexing.

classes.name: DocumentKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Manages a collection of documents and interfaces with vector database for retrieval.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Handles user queries, searches knowledge base, and generates responses using language models.

classes.name: SentenceTransformerEmbedder
classes.description: Embeds text using a specified sentence transformer model.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents an OpenAI chat model for generating responses.

classes.name: SentenceTransformerReranker
classes.description: Re-ranks search results using a sentence transformer model.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: Vector database interface using PostgreSQL with pgvector extension.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the index.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Generates and prints a response to a user query, with options for streaming and full reasoning.
